NEXT_PUBLIC_ONCHAINKIT_API_KEY.description: Coinbase OnchainKit API Key from https://portal.cdp.coinbase.com/

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Admin panel password (use a strong password!)

SECRET_COOKIE_PASSWORD.description: Session cookie encryption key (at least 32 characters). Generate with: openssl rand -base64 32

UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_URL.description: Upstash Redis REST URL (optional, falls back to in-memory storage)

BASE_MAINNET_RPC.description: Base Mainnet RPC URL (optional, for smart contract deployment)
